remarks: Ordering property for complex exponentiation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
recxpcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
cxplead.2 $e |- ( ph -> 1 <_ A ) $.
cxplead.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
cxplead.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
cxplead.5 $e |- ( ph -> B <_ C ) $.
cxplead $p |- ( ph -> ( A ^c B ) <_ ( A ^c C ) ) $.
